column4: I had Ubuntu and Vista as OS. I repalced Vista with XP and XP deleted Grub bootloader how to restore Grub?
once you play around with the MBR  ( Master Boot Record ) you may have a terrible time trying to repair it. Especially with Windows XP with Vista.
I teach computers all day long. The best result is to start over and wipe out the hard drive format it and then prepare it for a CLEAN INSTALL.
